The property as per the schedule below was acquired by my ancestors and inherited by me and my shares, which were inherited by me and are in my possession and possession, and since some of the shares as per the schedule below are not in my favour, I have sold the said property for Rs. 2,100/-
in writing for two thousand and one hundred rupees, the total amount of money being Rs. 2190/-, which was paid to me in cash at the time of writing of this deed. Therefore, the property as per the schedule is to be taken possession of on this day itself. Therefore, from this entire schedule.
I will pay the Panchayat taxes, etc. payable to this property without any reason from me, and I will enjoy the full right of donation, exchange, sale, and so on, and I will enjoy it with your heirs and beneficiaries as I wish. Thus, I will never have any such quarrels with my heirs and beneficiaries. Asin has not committed any illegal acts in the past. Therefore, if there are any quarrels about this property or about the rights of the beneficiaries, I will be able to avoid them all at my own expense and pay this property to you without any problems. Mukti, Nutalapati Parthasaram Vaiyai property is not the property of the Government
It is not a mortgaged property of the Government
It is not a property granted as an assessment
I agree to pay the depreciation tax due to the prosecution.
There are no buildings, women, etc. in the property. That there are
Full details required for the imposition of stamp duty as per section 27 of the Indian Stamp Act
In case of default, I agree to pay 3 times the stamp duty penalty fee as per section 70 for imposing fine as per section 41A, 64, 6 4)
I agree to pay the stamp duty penalty fee as per section 70.
Mukta
Nutalapati Parthasarathi. Valu-4-

encumbranceDetails.description: VILL/COL: APPA PURAM/VADDERA BAZAR, CHINAKAKUMANU HARIJANA WADA ( 1 TO 119) W-B: 0-6 HOUSE: 6-6 EXTENT: 21SQ.Yds SITE Boundires: [N]: R & B ROAD 3.3 FEET [S] PANCHAYAT BAZAR 3.3 FEET [E]: PANC HAYAT BAZAR 59 FEET [W]: CLAIMENT SITE 57 FEET
encumbranceDetails.deedValue: 0101 Sale Deed Mkt.Value: Rs. 2100 Cons.Value: Rs. 2100

sections.content: The property covered under Sale Deed No. 1048 of 2003, dated 12/Nov/2003, executed by Muktinuthalapati Parthasaradhi in favour of Veeraiah, towards the property admeasuring an extent of 21 Sq. Yds. (or) 189 Sq. Ft., bearing house number 6-6, Ward number 6, situated in Bhalgukhanudupalem Village and Grama Panchayath, within the District of Guntur, registered at sub-registrar office Kakumanu (724) is bounded as follows: North by: 3.3 Feet., R & B Road South by: 3.3 Feet., Panchayat Bazar East by: 59 Feet., Panchayat Bazar West by: 57 Feet., Claimant Site.

As per Registered Documents: 1. The property bearing house number 6-6, situated in Bhalgukhanudupalem Village, measuring about 21 Sq. Yds. (or) 189 Sq. Ft., was originally owned by Muktinuthalapati Parthasaradhi, who acquired the property through his ancestors. 2. The aforementioned Muktinuthalapati Parthasaradhi executed a Sale Deed on 12/Nov/2003, registered as document No. 1048 of 2003, before the SRO Kakumanu in favour of Veeraiah towards the property measuring 21 Sq. Yds. (or) 189 Sq. Ft.,, bearing house no.6-6, Ward number 6, situated at Bhalgukhanudupalem Village. (B) Additional Documents Supporting the Title : Note: It is to be noted that the HTR was not attached in this case, when the same is enquired with F.I., they reverted to release a conditional report. It is therefore advisable for F.I. to obtain HTR prior to the loan disbursement of the loan
The mutation proceedings were not concluded in the name of the current owner, Veeraiah.

contentList: Document Name * Document Description * Document Date * Document Type
Tax receipt (or) Mutation Proceedings*---*---* Original (or) Online
Mortgage Deed* Mortgage Deed executed by Veeraiah in favor of Vistaar Finance Pvt. Ltd.*---* Original
Document Name * Document Description * Document Date * Document Type

sections.content:
We have reviewed the documents provided to us as per the F.I policy and have concluded that the Veeraiah, possesses a clear, valid, and marketable title to the property measuring 21 Sq. Yds. (or) 189 Sq. Ft., bearing house number 6-6, Ward number 6, situated in Bhalgukhanudupalem Village and Grama Panchayath, within the District of Guntur, registered at sub-registrar office Kakumanu (724).

Further, the current owner, Veeraiah is to be added as a party to the loan structure along with the applicant Peddi Satish.

Note: It is to be noted that the online EC has been verified using the key parameters, namely the Document Number, Survey Number/House Number, and Split Survey/House Number of the concerned SRO, as per the Deed. However, cross-verification across multiple SROs has not been carried out due to the AP portal’s requirement of separate passwords for each search parameter, and the OTP-based authentication mechanism makes searches across multiple SROs operationally infeasible.
